snippet.title: SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Unleash Shadow the Hedgehog's new abilities against an ancient foe in SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS. Available October 25th on PS, XBOX, PC, and Switch.

Pre-order today: https://sonicxshadowgenerations.com/

Check out our other social pages to stay up-to-date on the latest Sonic happenings:

https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog
https://facebook.com/sonic
https://instagram.com/sonicthehedgehog
https://tiktok.com/@sonic_hedgehog
